Just wanted too voice my opinion on this restaurant.We booked a meal for two of us on the recommendation from our hotel and we arrive a few minutes late due too traffic,To be told by the Jumped Waiter we were late by 5 minutes and we may not have a table, he tutted when he spoke to me about this.We eventually were given a table then when had ordered the food they bought the wrong things that my wife had not ordered! We told the waiter who was not very apologetic and tutted again.We felt very uncomfortable and happy with the service and quality of food.Needless too say I would not recommend this restaurant or visit it again !!!!
